en: I'm a Data & AI lead with a passion for creating practical, AI-powered cloud-based products that blend low-code and pro-code approaches.

At PwC Portugal, I lead the design and implementation of Smart Products, Automation and AI integration, including Agentic AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Conversational AI/Chatbots. I am a certified Azure and Power Platform solution architect, holding 13 Microsoft certifications across multiple services. My technical background covers a wide range, including Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, and more. I use these skills to develop scalable AI products and automate workflows that make work easier and more efficient.

Beyond my professional work, I love learning. I have a Master's in Economics and Management of Science, Technology, and Innovation, and a diverse set of interests—from philosophy and history to design, photography, and astronomy. I started a Portuguese-language podcast to share insights and dive into new areas of knowledge.
pt: Sou líder de Data & IA com paixão por criar produtos cloud práticos com IA que combinam abordagens low-code e pro-code.

Na PwC Portugal, lidero o design e implementação de Produtos Inteligentes, Automação e integração de IA, incluindo IA Agêntica, Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e IA Conversacional/Chatbots. Sou arquiteto de soluções certificado em Azure e Power Platform, com 13 certificações Microsoft em vários serviços. Minha formação técnica abrange várias áreas, incluindo Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, e mais. Uso essas competências para desenvolver produtos de IA escaláveis e automatizar fluxos de trabalho que tornam o trabalho mais fácil e eficiente.

Além do meu trabalho profissional, adoro aprender. Tenho um Mestrado em Economia e Gestão da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação, e um conjunto diversificado de interesses—desde filosofia e história até design, fotografia e astronomia. Iniciei um podcast em português para partilhar conhecimentos e explorar novas áreas de conhecimento.

en.title: Product and Cloud Lead - Data & AI team
en.description: Since January 2024, I have been at the helm of managing, designing, and implementing AI-focused, cloud-based solutions, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and integration of Large Language Models (LLMs), as a leader within PwC Portugal's Data & AI team. Our aim is to deliver top-tier AI-powered products, striking a balance between pro-code and low-code methodologies, and leveraging cloud-based deployment for scalability. I lead a team of experts, setting architectural standards and leading the orchestration of AI automation workflows. My proficiency in Microsoft Azure and Power Platform is crucial for advancing these solutions from concept to worldwide implementation.

pt.title: Responsável de Produto e Cloud - Equipa de Data & IA
pt.description: Desde janeiro de 2024, tenho estado à frente da gestão, design e implementação de soluções baseadas em cloud focadas em IA, incluindo Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e integração de Grandes Modelos de Linguagem (LLMs), como líder dentro da equipa de Data & IA da PwC Portugal. O nosso objetivo é fornecer produtos de IA de alto nível, equilibrando metodologias pro-code e low-code, e aproveitando a implementação baseada em cloud para escalabilidade. Lidero uma equipa de especialistas, estabelecendo padrões arquitetónicos e liderando a orquestração de fluxos de trabalho de automação de IA. A minha proficiência em Microsoft Azure e Power Platform é crucial para avançar estas soluções do conceito à implementação mundial.

en.title: Cloud and Business Apps Lead - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As the Cloud and Business Apps Consulting Lead, I design cutting-edge cloud architectures, having contributed to over 90 opportunities for global partners and clients. I manage a team of specialized technical consultants within a Consulting Solutions team of about 80 professionals.

pt.title: Responsável de Cloud e Apps de Negócio - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como Responsável de Consultoria em Cloud e Apps de Negócio, desenho arquiteturas cloud de ponta, tendo contribuído para mais de 90 oportunidades para parceiros e clientes globais. Giro uma equipa de consultores técnicos especializados dentro de uma equipa de Soluções de Consultoria de cerca de 80 profissionais.

en.title: Specialist - Consulting Solutions team
en.description: As a Microsoft Power Platform specialist, I utilize the full suite of Power Platform tools, from Canvas Apps and Power BI reports to Power Portals/Pages and Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). I integrated these solutions with Azure (e.g., Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (e.g Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse, and SharePoint services. In addition to this expertise, I've successfully led full-stack pro-code app development projects, overseeing them from concept to delivery. Notably, I also earned PwC Portugal's first ever Hackathon as the team leader and technical specialist. This initiative has evolved into a product that we are now beginning to sell worldwide.

pt.title: Especialista - Equipa de Soluções de Consultoria
pt.description: Como especialista em Microsoft Power Platform, utilizo o conjunto completo de ferramentas Power Platform, desde Canvas Apps e relatórios Power BI até Power Portals/Pages e Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). Integrei estas soluções com Azure (por exemplo, Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (por exemplo, Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse e serviços SharePoint. Além desta experiência, liderei com sucesso projetos de desenvolvimento de aplicações pro-code full-stack, supervisionando-os desde o conceito até à entrega. Notavelmente, também ganhei o primeiro Hackathon da PwC Portugal como líder de equipa e especialista técnico. Esta iniciativa evoluiu para um produto que estamos agora a começar a vender mundialmente.

en.title: Analyst

I also took on team lead responsibilities and managed the backlog using Azure DevOps.

skillDescriptions.Low-code Development: Creating robust applications with minimal traditional coding, using visual interfaces and pre-built components to accelerate development while maintaining flexibility and scalability.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Computing: Designing and implementing solutions leveraging distributed computing resources provided over the internet, including Infrastructure (IaaS), Platform (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS).
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Azure: Building, deploying, and managing applications and services through Microsoft's cloud computing platform with expertise in AI, storage, networking, and security services.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Power Platform: Creating business solutions using Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents to analyze data, build solutions, automate processes, and create virtual agents.
skillDescriptions.Power BI: Data visualization and business intelligence tool that transforms data from various sources into interactive dashboards and business analytics reports.
skillDescriptions.Power Automate: Cloud-based service that allows users to create automated workflows between apps and services to synchronize files, get notifications, collect data and more.
skillDescriptions.Data Science: Extracting knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data using scientific methods, algorithms, processes, and systems.
skillDescriptions.Azure AI Services: Suite of AI services and APIs to help developers create intelligent applications without direct ML expertise, including vision, speech, language, and decision services.
skillDescriptions.Cloud Architecture: Designing high-level cloud computing systems that ensure optimal performance, reliability, security, and cost-efficiency while leveraging cloud-native capabilities.
skillDescriptions.Dynamics 365: Microsoft's line of enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management applications.
skillDescriptions.Databricks: Unified analytics platform for large-scale data processing and machine learning, optimized for Spark workloads.
skillDescriptions.RAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation: An AI framework that enhances large language models by retrieving relevant information from external knowledge sources to generate more accurate and contextual responses.
skillDescriptions.LLM Integration: Integrating Large Language Models into applications and systems, enabling them to process, understand, and generate human-like text for various use cases.
skillDescriptions.Python: High-level programming language used for general-purpose programming, with particular strength in data analysis, machine learning, and AI applications.
skillDescriptions.C#/.NET: Programming language and framework for building web applications, services, desktop applications, and more with Microsoft technologies.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft PowerPoint: Creating professional presentations for business, educational, and technical purposes with advanced design capabilities.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Excel: Advanced data analysis, manipulation, and visualization using features like pivot tables, formulas, and macros.
skillDescriptions.Microsoft Word: Creating professional documents with formatting, styles, and collaboration features.
skillDescriptions.Business Strategy: Developing and implementing plans to meet organizational goals, including market analysis, resource allocation, and performance evaluation.
skillDescriptions.Project Management: Planning, executing, and closing projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and meeting requirements.
skillDescriptions.Communication: Effectively conveying information through various channels to ensure understanding, build relationships, and drive action.
skillDescriptions.Leadership: Guiding and inspiring teams to achieve objectives while developing their skills and fostering a positive work environment.
skillDescriptions.Product Management: Overseeing the development and marketing of products throughout their lifecycle, from conception to retirement.
skillDescriptions.Business Development: Creating long-term value through relationship building, market opportunities, and strategic partnerships.
skillDescriptions.Science Communication: Effectively communicating complex scientific concepts to diverse audiences through various media.
skillDescriptions.History: Studying and analyzing past events to understand present circumstances and inform future decisions.
skillDescriptions.SQL: Structured Query Language for managing and manipulating relational databases, including querying, updating, and data definition.
skillDescriptions.Marketing: Promoting products or services through market research, advertising, and customer relationship management.
skillDescriptions.Economics: Analyzing the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services to optimize resource allocation.
skillDescriptions.Politics: Understanding governance systems, public policy, and decision-making processes in organizations and societies.
